values: 口；口腔；嘴；嘴巴；开口；入口；入海口；河口；（酒的）口感；话语方式；讲话方式；表达方式；言谈；吹口；（表达不满或不敬的）出言不逊
说；读；讲话；发…的音；夸张地发音；装腔作势地说；言不由衷地说；用嘴触碰

synonym.mean: 做作地说，装腔作势地说；喃喃地说出

word_group.brief_definition: 嘴不严, 爱泄露秘密
我真多嘴(指:真不该说出来）
夸夸其谈；信口开河；喋喋不休
只说不作, 光打雷不下雨
口语；非正式（或非官方）话语
轻率的人；喜欢自吹自擂的人
自吹自擂；毫无顾忌地高声谈论；固执己见地高谈阔论

word_group.phrase: a bitter taste in the mouth

bilingual.source: Eyes and ears and mouth and nose.
bilingual.target: 眼睛和耳朵和嘴巴和鼻子。

bilingual.source: Yes, I eat little girls with my big mouth.
bilingual.target: 是的，我用我的大嘴巴吃小女孩。

bilingual.source: Spit the water from your mouth into the sink.
bilingual.target: 把嘴里的水吐到水槽里。

bilingual.source: Charlie nodded, his mouth bulging with chocolate.
bilingual.target: 查理点点头，嘴里塞满了巧克力。

bilingual.source: The crow was pleased and opened her mouth to sing.

list.abstract: mouth（英[maʊθ , maʊð]，美[maʊθ , maʊð]），英语单词。可做名词或动词用。做名词时，指入口、口腔、入海口等；做动词时，指装腔作势地说、吃、用嘴触碰等。英语短语有keep your mouth shut（守口如瓶），例句为You don't cover your mouth while coughing.（你咳嗽时没有捂住嘴。） 名词类的近义词有jaws、ostium，及物动词类的近义词为grumble；复数为mouths，第三人称单数为mouths，现在分词为mouthing，过去式为mouthed，过去分词为mouthed。

yingyinNormal.en: I can't believe you kissed my sister with moth mouth.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你居然用吃过虫子的嘴吻我妹妹。

yingyinNormal.en: How about "constantly talks with food in her mouth"?
yingyinNormal.zh: “经常说话的时候满嘴食物”这条怎么样？

yingyinNormal.en: There's no way I'm climbing into some dolphin's mouth.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我绝对不会自己爬到一只海豚的嘴里去的。
yingyinNormal.videoNameEn: 《The SpongeBob Movie: Sponge Out of Water》

yingyinNormal.en: To put it plainly, his mouth was on the outside of his face.
yingyinNormal.zh: 说白了就是他的嘴跑到他的脸外面了。

yingyinNormal.en: I told you to put tape on his mouth! And I told you he bit me!
yingyinNormal.zh: 我说了让你用胶带封住他的嘴！我也说了这货咬我！

yingyinNormal.en: Which isn't bad, but anything that you wipe your mouth on gets thrown away.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这也不是坏事，但你用来擦嘴的任何东西只会被扔掉。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, I could get into the head wrap but the veil across the mouth, it freaks me out.
yingyinNormal.zh: 头巾我还能接受。但是嘴前的面纱看着就诡异。

yingyinNormal.en: Not only is it signed to me but this is where he wiped his mouth.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这上面不仅有特意给我的签名，而且这里，还是他擦过嘴的地方。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, I grew up in a family where plant husbandry was kind of a thing... Shut your tiny mouth now!
yingyinNormal.zh: 我家那里都流行种植业…闭上你的小嘴!

yingyinNormal.en: And then you could whistle a tune. Oh, I've got the wrong kind of mouth. Your mouth is fine. You just need to practice.
yingyinNormal.zh: 之后你就能吹出个曲调。啊，我想我肯定是嘴巴有点问题。你的嘴没有问题！你只是需要练习。

yingyinNormal.en: And to make it worse, they turned me into a cartoon and slapped tape across my mouth.
yingyinNormal.zh: 更可恶的是他们居然把我画成这样，在我的嘴上画胶带。

yingyinNormal.en: Chloe paints the puppet's eyes. Can I do the mouth? Ok. My name is Peppa!
yingyinNormal.zh: 克洛伊画了木偶的眼睛。我能画她的嘴吗？可以。我的名字叫佩琪。

yingyinNormal.en: And the only reason why you are still alive is because I am allowing it. So shut your mouth.
yingyinNormal.zh: 而你还活着的唯一理由就是我没有下令，所以闭上你的嘴。

yingyinNormal.en: How do you decide anything? Think about it with your brain, and then say it with your mouth.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你平常怎么决定任何事情呢？用你的脑子想，再用你的嘴说出口。

yingyinNormal.en: During the kissing? What did you do, sneeze in her mouth? I did that to a girl once.
yingyinNormal.zh: 接吻的时候？你做了什么，对着她的嘴打喷嚏么？我对一个女孩儿做过一次。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, where are they? I can't see any eggs. They are in our tummies. And around your mouth.
yingyinNormal.zh: 彩蛋在哪呢？我怎么一个也没看见呢。它们在我们的肚子里了。还有你们的嘴上。

yingyinNormal.en: Because when the mouth is moving, it will affect all the sketches. And they all come out like this.
yingyinNormal.zh: 因为只要嘴不停地在动就会影响到所有人的画稿，最后的效果就会是这样。

yingyinNormal.en: You know, Oleg, since Sophie's doing a food cleanse, maybe you could do a cleanse for your potty mouth.
yingyinNormal.zh: 奥列格，苏菲都要开始通过饮食净化身体了，你是不是也该"净化"一下你那张淫嘴。

yingyinNormal.en: You shut your mouth. Three Expendables, our brothers. Men we ate with, fought with, bled with. Dead.
yingyinNormal.zh: 闭上你臭嘴。三个敢死队员，都是好兄弟，我们一起吃饭，一起战斗，一起流血，都死了。

yingyinNormal.en: What? You hold my hand, you kiss my mouth, but you draw the line at 102 fever? What happened to our love?
yingyinNormal.zh: 怎么？你牵我的手，亲我的嘴就行，但我发烧到39度就过界了吗？我们的爱情怎么了？

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: Before the birth of proper dentistry, <highlight>mouths</highlight> were often in a shocking state of hygiene.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在适当的牙科技术诞生之前，口腔卫生状况往往令人震惊。

examination_example.sentence: When we look at a face or a picture, our eyes pause on one spot at a time, often on the eyes or <highlight>mouth</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当我们看一张脸或一幅画时，我们的眼睛每次停留在一个地方，这个地方通常是眼睛或嘴巴上。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 满口；一口；长而拗口的词；难读的词组

word_family.mean: n. 嘴；口；入口；口腔；入海口；枪口；出言不逊；马口；口感

examination_example.sentence: The problem often arises around the eyes or <highlight>mouth</highlight>, says Webber.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Webber称，这个问题经常出现在眼睛或嘴巴周围。

word_usage.usage: "by word of mouth"表示“口口相传”， 不和a或the连用。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: Many children like to put foreign objects in their <highlight>mouths</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 很多孩子喜欢把异物放进嘴里。

word_usage.usage: "by word of mouth"表示“口口相传”， 不和a或the连用。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: The successful dogs realized that a smiling <highlight>mouth</highlight> means the same thing as smiling eyes.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 成功的狗意识到微笑的嘴和微笑的眼睛是一回事。

examination_example.sentence: Instead, they explode in your <highlight>mouth</highlight> like little flavor bombs.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 相反，它们会在你嘴里爆炸，就像包含味道的小炸弹一样。

examination_example.sentence: Heart in <highlight>mouth</highlight>, I reached the fence and looked over.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我提心吊胆地走到栅栏边，向外望去。

examination_example.sentence: New York City, for example, is near a large harbour at the <highlight>mouth</highlight> of the Hudson River.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 例如，纽约市就在哈德逊河口的一个大港口附近。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: Then she turned and ran outside to play, leaving me eyes wide and <highlight>mouth</highlight> open.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然后她转身跑出去玩，留下瞠目结舌的我。

examination_example.sentence: Avoid touching your eyes, nose and <highlight>mouth</highlight> before washing your hands.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 洗手前避免触摸眼睛、鼻子和嘴巴。

examination_example.sentence: She put a small piece of the cake in her <highlight>mouth</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 她把一小块蛋糕放进嘴里。

examination_example.sentence: The bays and the river <highlight>mouths</highlight> where the tide is high are usually perfect sites to build tidal power stations.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 涨潮的海湾和河口通常是建造潮汐发电站的最佳地点。

examination_example.sentence: The <highlight>mouth</highlight> of the bottle was small.

word_usage.usage: "by word of mouth"表示“口口相传”， 不和a或the连用。
